price: 86. Dheh: “Waa kuma Rabbiga samooyinka toddobada ah iyo Rabbiga Carshiga Weyn13?.
arabic: قُلۡ مَن رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ ٱلسَّبۡعِ وَرَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
footnotes: 13. Nabigu s.c.w. wuxuu yidhi: “Xaalka Alle waa ka weyn yahay sidaas, Carshigiisuna waa sidaas, wuxuu ku tilmaamay gacantiisa sida qubbad”.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul man rabbu al-samāwāti al-sabʿi warabbu al-ʿarshi al-ʿaẓīmi
